description:
cmd/api: Blank line before "toolate" build tag causes documentation to break

The blank line causes the build tag to become the description
in the documentation of the API utility.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

This is not correct.

That's a test file for vet.  See the Makefile in that directory.



On Tue, Apr 23, 2013 at 6:36 AM, <lucio.dere@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> cmd/api: Blank line before "toolate" build tag causes documentation to
> break
>
> The blank line causes the build tag to become the description
> in the documentation of the API utility.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/8918043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8918043/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/cmd/vet/buildtag_bad.go
>
>
> Index: src/cmd/vet/buildtag_bad.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/cmd/vet/buildtag_bad.go
> +++ b/src/cmd/vet/buildtag_bad.go
> @@ -6,6 +6,5 @@
>
>  // +build !!bang // ERROR "invalid double negative in build constraint"
>  // +build @#$ // ERROR "invalid non-alphanumeric build constraint"
> -
>  // +build toolate // ERROR "build comment appears too late in file"
>  package main
>
>
> --

> .
